section_title: PRE-SESSIONAL WORKSHOP ON FOREST MANAGEMENT ACCOUNTING:
sentences: This workshop, which was requested by AWG-KP 12, took place on 30 July in Bonn.
The event focused on proposed options for forest management accounting, including the numerical implications of the use of reference levels, and the mechanisms for a possible review process.
For more information on all of these events, visit: http://climate-l.iisd.org/
